full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Contract Title

Elder Services

### Reference Number

PW-23-01028202

### Solicitation Number

21206-24-4308661

### Tender Closing Date

2023-03-16 13:00:00

### Contact Information

Contact Person: Claudia Landry
Email: [claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Phone: 506-378-8722

### Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a supplier to provide Elder Services to meet the spiritual and cultural needs of Indigenous offenders. The successful supplier will provide counseling, teachings, and ceremonial services to Indigenous offenders, with the goal of promoting healing and balance.

### Key Requirements

* The supplier must be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor within that community.
* The supplier must have a minimum of five (5) years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services and teachings to Indigenous people.
* The supplier must be familiar with and able to conduct a variety of ceremonies with a focus on healing according to their own teachings.
* The supplier must meet with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC to share their experiences and have the Elders determine the validity of the statement of capabilities.

### Procurement Details

* This procurement is set-aside for an Indigenous Supplier in accordance with the government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement.
* The proposed contract is for a period of one (1) year, with an option to extend the contract for two (2) additional one-year periods.
* The estimated value of the contract, including options, is $275,441.71 (GST/HST extra).

### How to Respond

Interested suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in the ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.  The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is March 16, 2023 at 13:00:00.  A response to this notice and the instructions for submitting a statement of capabilities can be obtained by contacting Claudia Landry at [claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca
